job_details.Functieomschrijving:
This is your chance to start using Generative AI in a practical, real-world setting, grow as a developer, and contribute to cutting-edge software. At Sqills, we'll support you every step of the way as you:
     * Apply your Python experience on the job, while building exciting AI-powered tools.
     * Work on a mission-critical SaaS platform used by international customers for inventory, reservation, and ticketing.
     * Collaborate with a team of passionate developers who are happy to share their knowledge and help you grow.
     * Experiment with innovative technologies and shape the future of Generative AI in real-world applications.

What you'll be doing

   As part of an Agile DevOps team, you'll take ownership of your work and grow alongside talented peers. Your responsibilities will include:
     * Developing Generative AI-powered tools that enhance internal processes and uncover new possibilities for S3 Passenger. For example: improving our intelligent AI powered chat bot so users are able to find answers quickly based on our internal documentation.
     * Designing and implementing backend microservices in the AWS Cloud using AWS Bedrock with Anthropic Claude models to support high-performance and scalable systems.
     * Learning Python while applying it to meaningful, real-world projects. For example: using AI chat bots instead of complex wizards in our S3 Passenger product for configuration.
     * Collaborating to design secure, high-quality, and maintainable software.
     * Debugging and optimising systems using tools like New Relic, Sentry, and other monitoring platforms.

What makes us different

   At Sqills, we focus on growth, quality, and collaboration. Here's what you can expect:
     * Learn as you go: No prior AI experience? No problem. We'll provide the tools and mentorship you need to succeed.
     * Tools and technologies: Start with what you know and expand your skill set to include other programming languages like Golang and AWS services like Lambda and DynamoDB.
     * Infrastructure excellence: Work with OpenTofu, Kubernetes, and AWS Cloud Development Kit to build Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) solutions.
     * Hands-on experience with AI: Experiment with Generative AI and apply it to real-world challenges.
     * Supportive culture: A company that values growth, creativity, and knowledge sharing.
job_details.full_text:
Generative AI Software Developer

This is your chance to start using Generative AI in a practical, real-world setting, grow as a developer, and contribute to cutting-edge software. At Sqills, we'll support you every step of the way as you:
     * Apply your Python experience on the job, while building exciting AI-powered tools.
     * Work on a mission-critical SaaS platform used by international customers for inventory, reservation, and ticketing.
     * Collaborate with a team of passionate developers who are happy to share their knowledge and help you grow.
     * Experiment with innovative technologies and shape the future of Generative AI in real-world applications.

What you'll be doing

   As part of an Agile DevOps team, you'll take ownership of your work and grow alongside talented peers. Your responsibilities will include:
     * Developing Generative AI-powered tools that enhance internal processes and uncover new possibilities for S3 Passenger. For example: improving our intelligent AI powered chat bot so users are able to find answers quickly based on our internal documentation.
     * Designing and implementing backend microservices in the AWS Cloud using AWS Bedrock with Anthropic Claude models to support high-performance and scalable systems.
     * Learning Python while applying it to meaningful, real-world projects. For example: using AI chat bots instead of complex wizards in our S3 Passenger product for configuration.
     * Collaborating to design secure, high-quality, and maintainable software.
     * Debugging and optimising systems using tools like New Relic, Sentry, and other monitoring platforms.

What makes us different

   At Sqills, we focus on growth, quality, and collaboration. Here's what you can expect:
     * Learn as you go: No prior AI experience? No problem. We'll provide the tools and mentorship you need to succeed.
     * Tools and technologies: Start with what you know and expand your skill set to include other programming languages like Golang and AWS services like Lambda and DynamoDB.
     * Infrastructure excellence: Work with OpenTofu, Kubernetes, and AWS Cloud Development Kit to build Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) solutions.
     * Hands-on experience with AI: Experiment with Generative AI and apply it to real-world challenges.
     * Supportive culture: A company that values growth, creativity, and knowledge sharing.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and application of Generative AI, specifically mentioning "Generative AI-powered tools", "intelligent AI powered chat bot", "AWS Bedrock with Anthropic Claude models", and "AI chat bots". It also highlights building backend microservices, working with LLM frameworks (implied by Claude models and AWS Bedrock), and deploying applications in the cloud, aligning with the core responsibilities and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves developing Generative AI-powered tools and improving AI-powered chatbots, which directly relates to creating and adapting generative models.
The description explicitly mentions improving an AI chatbot to answer questions based on internal documentation, a common application of generative AI and RAG systems.
job_tasks.phrase: improving our intelligent AI powered chat bot so users are able to find answers quickly based on our internal documentation

job_tasks.justification: The role requires designing and implementing backend microservices in AWS Cloud, which is a core software development activity for building applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Designing and implementing backend microservices in the AWS Cloud

job_tasks.justification: The job involves learning and applying Python to real-world projects, including using AI chatbots within a product, indicating software development for user-facing features.
job_tasks.phrase: Learning Python while applying it to meaningful, real-world projects. For example: using AI chat bots instead of complex wizards in our S3 Passenger product for configuration.

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating to design secure, high-quality, and maintainable software is a fundamental aspect of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating to design secure, high-quality, and maintainable software

job_tasks.justification: The role is part of an Agile DevOps team and involves debugging and optimizing systems using monitoring platforms, which falls under operations and maintenance of production systems.
job_tasks.phrase: As part of an Agile DevOps team, you'll take ownership of your work

job_tasks.justification: Debugging and optimizing systems using tools like New Relic and Sentry is a key part of monitoring and maintaining software in production.
job_tasks.phrase: Debugging and optimising systems using tools like New Relic, Sentry, and other monitoring platforms.

job_tasks.justification: Building Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) solutions using tools like OpenTofu and AWS CDK is a software development practice for managing infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with OpenTofu, Kubernetes, and AWS Cloud Development Kit to build Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) solutions.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions contributing to a mission-critical SaaS platform used by international customers for inventory, reservation, and ticketing, indicating an understanding of the business context.
job_tasks.phrase: Work on a mission-critical SaaS platform used by international customers for inventory, reservation, and ticketing.
